snippet: After its successful landing on Mars, the rover Curiosity will give us a flood of data from its sensors and cameras, in something close to real time.
abstract: Editorial praises NASA's Curiosity mission for its successful landing on Mars, calling it a triumph of scientific technology and the human imagination.
lead_paragraph: After its successful landing on Mars, the rover Curiosity will give us a flood of data from its sensors and cameras, in something close to real time.
